members.name: isRefillEnabled
members.comment: Server owners have to enable whether or not an object in a world should refill

return: If the world this inventory is currently in has Replenishable Lootables enabled

members.name: hasBeenFilled
members.comment: Whether or not this object has ever been filled

members.name: hasPlayerLooted
members.comment: Has this player ever looted this block

return: Whether or not this player has looted this block

members.name: hasPlayerLooted
members.comment: Has this player ever looted this block

return: Whether or not this player has looted this block

members.name: getLastLooted
members.comment: Gets the timestamp, in milliseconds, of when the player last looted this object

return: Timestamp last looted, or null if player has not looted this object

members.name: getLastLooted
members.comment: Gets the timestamp, in milliseconds, of when the player last looted this object

return: Timestamp last looted, or null if player has not looted this object

members.name: setHasPlayerLooted
members.comment: Change the state of whether or not a player has looted this block

param: player - The player to change state for
looted - true to add player to looted list, false to remove
return: The previous state of whether the player had looted this or not

members.name: setHasPlayerLooted
members.comment: Change the state of whether or not a player has looted this block

param: player - The player to change state for
looted - true to add player to looted list, false to remove
return: The previous state of whether the player had looted this or not

members.name: hasPendingRefill
members.comment: Returns Whether or not this object has been filled and now has a pending refill

members.name: getLastFilled
members.comment: Gets the timestamp in milliseconds that the Lootable object was last refilled

return: -1 if it was never refilled, or timestamp in milliseconds

members.name: getNextRefill
members.comment: Gets the timestamp in milliseconds that the Lootable object will refill

return: -1 if it is not scheduled for refill, or timestamp in milliseconds

members.name: setNextRefill
members.comment: Sets the timestamp in milliseconds of the next refill for this object

param: refillAt - timestamp in milliseconds. -1 to clear next refill
return: The previous scheduled time to refill, or -1 if was not scheduled

name: com.destroystokyo.paper.loottable.LootableInventory
comment: Represents an Inventory that contains a Loot Table associated to it that will automatically fill on first open. A new feature and API is provided to support automatically refreshing the contents of the inventory based on that Loot Table after a configurable amount of time has passed. The behavior of how the Inventory is filled based on the loot table may vary based on Minecraft versions and the Loot Table feature.
